This doujinshi follows the misadventures of a harem protagonist with brain cells. Granted, only from a quirk, but I personally think this is ok. Objectively, however, I don’t appreciate that there is no background on how Deku could’ve had that quirk genetically. Genetics work with quirks, and neither of the quirks have to do with any sort of hormone or pheromone that has ever existed. His parents have the quirk fire breath and object levitation. Which neither could even do anything remotely sexual (internally.) 2/10, because of the plot not being held together and not being a fantastic fap.
